sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: She made the announcement after a meeting with the leadership of the Christian Democratic Union Party in Berlin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Five years ago, she decided to run for office rather ad hoc.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: This time, the situation is completely different, she says. viel durchgemacht in den vergangenen fünf Jahren und ich glaube, man kann sagen, wir haben mehr geschafft, als wir uns je vorstellen konnten. In diesen fünf Jahren ist nicht nur meine Leidenschaft für Europa gewachsen, sondern natürlich auch meine Erfahrung, wie viel dieses Europa für seine Menschen leisten kann.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: von der Leyen will now stand as European People's Party lead candidate in the European Parliament elections in June.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: By announcing her candidacy, von der Leyen has put an end to a months-long speculation about her political future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Her second term in Brussels would have one overriding objective, she says.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: We want to strengthen democracy of Europe in the European Union and we want to address all the challenges around us but in a way that people know that there is safety and security within the European Union for them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: For many across the world, von der Leyen has become the main European interlocutor. Her re-election would ensure continuity as the world faces multiple crises.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

We will tell you about it soon. We will definitely find out who and how he committed this crime. We will name the names and show the faces.

sentences.sentence: Navalny's mother was denied access to the morgue in Salihar on Monday. The staff refused to answer if the body was there, according to Navalny's spokesperson.

Alfonso Reda, the victorious Galician regional president, said it was a victory for common sense. The People's Party won 40 seats in the 75-seat regional assembly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Galician Nationalist Bloc finished second with 25 seats, followed by the Socialist Party with nine seats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: More than 10 million children were forced to flee their homes last year in the world's 10 largest crises, according to new analysis by Save the Children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This has likely pushed the number of children displaced globally to more than 50 million, the highest number ever, more than doubling since 2010.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Last year, an additional 29,000 children a day were estimated to be newly displaced inside their own country or had fled to another country, with children in Sudan and Somalia the most affected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Save the Children says a displaced child has most likely witnessed the kind of violence or destruction that no young person should ever have to see. And they have to leave everything they know behind.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It says that when children lose their homes, they lose almost everything, their access to health care, education, food and safety.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In the Gaza Strip, as of the end of 2023, the proportion of the population displaced within the enclave in just 10 weeks was one of the highest recorded globally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: With these latest figures, Save the Children is underlining the need for children around the world to be supported.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It says they need not only vital supplies, but also security, education, shelter, health, a place to play, laugh and learn, just a few things many of us take for granted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The European Commission has said it is formally investigating TikTok. The Commission wants to

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: make sure the app is complying with the Digital Services Act, which took effect last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It also wants to analyse if TikTok is sufficiently protecting minors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The app's measures to stop minors from finding inappropriate content might not be, quote, reasonable, proportionate and effective. The commission also wants to investigate TikTok's transparency, especially when it comes to advertising on the platform.
